data.description_html:
This spell reduces the hardness and hit points of the targeted object to that of glass (hardness 1 and 1 hit point/inch of thickness).
If the object already has a lower hardness score, the spell has no effect.
(As always, if the object is attended, its owner receives a saving throw; unattended nonmagical objects do not receive saving throws).
Material Component: A glass needle worth 100 gp.
data.name: Trobriand's Crystalbrittle
data.target: One nonmagical object up to 1 cu. ft. per level
